mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_project_info(project_id, project_name, host_name, content, skill, institution) VALUES(user_project_seq.NEXTVAL,#{projectName}, #{hostName}, #{content}, #{skill}, #{institution})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_project_info SET name = #{name}, host_name = #{hostName}, content = #{content}, skill = #{skill}, institution = #{institution}
mapper.select: SELECT name, host_name, content, skill, institution FROM user_project_info WHERE project_id=#{VALUE}
